scenario:
Verisk, a leading global data analytics and technology provider, has nominated Christopher J. Perry and Sabra R. Purtill to stand for election as directors at its Annual Meeting on May 20, 2025. Perry is the president of Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. and Purtill is an experienced executive in insurance and financial services, currently serving as an advisor at American International Group, Inc.

Perry and Purtill will bring deep operating expertise and unique insights into the insurance, financial, and information services industries to the board. They have extensive experience in leadership roles, including corporate finance, capital markets, and treasury, as well as financial reporting and communications.

The current directors, Brooks and Lane, will retire from the Verisk Board of Directors effective May 20, 2025. Verisk's Board of Directors expressed gratitude for their leadership, guidance, and commitment to enhancing shareholder value during a period of significant organizational transformation.

Verisk (Nasdaq: VRSK) is a leading strategic data analytics and technology partner to the global insurance industry, empowering clients to strengthen operating efficiency, improve underwriting and claims outcomes, and make informed decisions about global risks. The company has teams across more than 20 countries and consistently earns certification by Great Place to Work, fostering an inclusive culture where all team members feel they belong.
